preqs: OHS1000, DWG1201 or DWG1301 or DWG1103, or permission from Unit Coordinator

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {DWG1103, DWG1201, DWG1301} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {OHS1000})

description: This unit investigates feminist and conceptual perspectives in relation to current painting and broader contemporary practices. Particular attention will be paid to the politics of the gaze, critique of conventions and hierachies and a critical assessment of the art historical cannon. The unit engages with a variety of subversive material and political strategies that articulate the position surrounding these ideas. Students achieve a level of technical and conceptual sophistication as well as a consideration of their works in the context of contemporary art.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
